desc: With more than 35 years of outdoor experience, GEAR AID champions renewal so gear lasts longer. Whether you hike, camp, dive, hunt, or fish, GEAR AID is at your side to keep well-loved gear in tip-top shape with Aquaseal adhesives, Seam Grip sealants, Revivex water repellents, and Tenacious Tape patches.

layout.text: Our new hybrid gear clip available in four versatile sizes. Coming soon!
